vocab.def: Two hands push info outward to audience.
Flick/throw info outward; SHARE shows distribution.
C-hand taps then moves; show ON with switch gesture.
Show linked chain / mimic phone scan.
Direct action line: SIGN-UP, BUY-TICKET, RSVP-NOW.

sections.heading: 1) Promotion Frame
sections.body: Keep promos short and ordered: **TIME â†’ TOPIC â†’ CTA**. Example: **FRIDAY 7PM â†’ CLUB SHOW â†’ RSVP-NOW LINK BELOW.** Add accessibility: **CAPTION-ON, INTERPRETER PROVIDED.**

sections.heading: 3) Caption Craft (Concise Text)
sections.body: Pair your signed promo with a text caption (max 2 lines). Template: **WHEN/WHERE + WHAT + CTA + ACCESS.** Example: *Fri 7p â€¢ Gym â€¢ Deaf Culture Night â€” RSVP now â€¢ Captions & Interpreter provided*.

sections.heading: 4) Posting & Sharing
sections.body: Use signs: **POST/UPLOAD**, **SHARE**, **TAG/HASHTAG (fs-H-A-S-H-T-A-G)**. Point to where link/QR appears (below, side). Confirm: **YOU SEE LINK?**

sections.heading: 5) Partner Drill: Promo & Repeat-Back

sections.teacherNote: Look for Time-first, explicit CTA, and accessibility info.

items.q: Gloss a 2-line promo for: Thu 6pm, room 210, tutoring session, sign-up link below, captions on.
